item.title: svelte-kit dev is no longer available — use vite dev instead
item.description: svelte-kit dev is no longer available — use vite dev instead Install vite as a devDependency with npm/pnpm/etc Create a vite.config.js with the @sveltejs/kit/vite plugin (see below) vite.config.js import { sveltekit } from '@sveltejs/kit/vite'; /** @type {import('vite').UserConfig} */ const config = { plugins: [sveltekit()] }; export default config; Update your package.json scripts to reference vite dev instead of `svelte-kit dev, cambiar los comandos, build, dev, preview.
